home.heroTitle: Innovative Web Solutions for Your Modern Business
home.heroDescription: At ProwebInov Agency, we build stunning, high-performance websites and applications that drive growth and deliver exceptional user experiences.

technology.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
technology.description: We use the latest frameworks and technologies to build fast, scalable, and secure web applications.

customer.title: Customer-Centric Approach
customer.description: Your success is our priority. We work closely with you to understand your needs and deliver tailored solutions.

results.title: Proven Results
results.description: Our portfolio speaks for itself. We have a track record of helping businesses grow their online presence.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a wide range of services to help your business succeed online. From web development to marketing, we have you covered.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Let's talk about how we can help you achieve your goals. Request a free, no-obligation quote today.

footer.description: Innovative web solutions for your modern business.

quote.title: Request a Quote
quote.description: Tell us about your project, and we'll get back to you with a personalized quote.

quoteForm.name: Name
quoteForm.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project, your goals, and your budget.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.description: We offer a wide range of services to help your business succeed online. From web development to marketing, we have you covered.

achievementsPage.title: Our Achievements
achievementsPage.description: We are proud of the work we've done. Here are some of our successful projects that showcase our expertise and commitment to quality.

startWebsite.title: Start Website
startWebsite.description: A modern, mobile-friendly starter website built with HTML & JavaScript. Ideal for small businesses.

features.updates: Updates managed by us (no client panel)

showcaseWebsite.title: Showcase Website
showcaseWebsite.description: SEO-optimized static website for startups or personal brands with a clean professional presence.

dynamicWebsite.title: Dynamic Website / Blog
dynamicWebsite.description: Full-stack dynamic website with admin panel using React & Node.js.

advancedWebapp.title: Advanced Website / Web App
advancedWebapp.description: Custom web applications built with React, Next.js, and Node.js for complex business needs.

features.systems: E-commerce / Booking / Community / Real estate or product catalog

reactEcommerce.title: React E-Commerce Website
reactEcommerce.description: High-performance MERN-stack e-commerce platform with secure payments and admin dashboard.

starterApp.title: Starter Mobile App
starterApp.description: Simple and fast mobile app for Android built using React Native or Flutter.

standardApp.title: Standard Mobile App
standardApp.description: Professionally designed mobile app with authentication and API integration.

advancedApp.title: Advanced Mobile App
advancedApp.description: Scalable full-stack mobile app with custom backend and admin panel.

enterpriseApp.title: Enterprise App / SaaS
enterpriseApp.description: Production-grade SaaS or enterprise mobile solution with cloud & real-time features.

ecommerceMobileApp.title: E-Commerce Mobile App
ecommerceMobileApp.description: Complete mobile shopping app with secure checkout and admin analytics.

features.stack: React Native + Node.js/MongoDB or Java/SQL setup

appPublishing.title: App Build & Publishing
appPublishing.description: End-to-end Play Store & App Store publishing and compliance handling.

features.build: Final build preparation for Android (Play Store) and iOS (App Store)
features.signing: Configuration of app signing, versioning, and assets (icons, splash screens, etc.)
features.accounts: Creation/setup of your Google Play Console and Apple Developer Account
features.listing: Store listing setup (description, screenshots, privacy policy, etc.)
features.approval: Handling of first approval and re-submission

innovatex.title: E-commerce Platform for InnovateX
innovatex.description: A complete e-commerce solution with custom features, boosting their sales by 40%.

connectsphere.title: Mobile App for ConnectSphere
connectsphere.description: A cross-platform mobile application to enhance user engagement and connectivity.

datadriven.title: BI Dashboard for DataDriven Inc.
datadriven.description: An intuitive and powerful business intelligence dashboard for real-time data analysis.

prestige.title: Corporate Rebranding for Prestige Corp
prestige.description: A full rebranding project, including a new website, logo, and marketing materials.
